mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opinion(title, content, publisher, opinion_sign, summary, home_show) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{publisher}, #{opinionSign}, #{summary}, #{homeShow})
mapper.select: SELECT opinion_id essay_id, title, content, opinion_sign essay_sign, publish_time, nikename, summary, comment_num, visitor_num, praise_num, (SELECT real_path FROM picture WHERE pertain = opinion_sign LIMIT 1) cover FROM opinion LEFT JOIN USER ON USER.user_sign = publisher LEFT JOIN statistic ON opinion_sign = pertain ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT opinion_id essay_id, title, content, opinion_sign essay_sign, publish_time, nikename, summary, comment_num, visitor_num, praise_num, summary, (SELECT real_path FROM picture WHERE pertain = opinion_sign LIMIT 1) cover FROM opinion LEFT JOIN USER ON USER.user_sign = publisher LEFT JOIN statistic ON opinion_sign = pertain WHERE opinion_id = #{opinionId}
SELECT opinion_id essay_id, title FROM opinion WHERE opinion_id > #{opinionId} ORDER BY publish_time LIMIT 1
SELECT opinion_id essay_id, title FROM opinion WHERE opinion_id < #{opinionId} ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT opinion_id essay_id, title, opinion_sign essay_sign, publish_time, nikename, summary, comment_num, visitor_num, praise_num, (SELECT real_path FROM picture WHERE pertain = opinion_sign LIMIT 1) cover FROM opinion LEFT JOIN USER ON USER.user_sign = publisher LEFT JOIN statistic ON opinion_sign = pertain WHERE home_show = 1 ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT 0, 3
mapper.update: UPDATE opinion SET home_show = #{homeShow} WHERE opinion_sign = #{opinionSign}
